blocks.name: cem
blocks.content: The Euler-Mascheroni constant. (The label abbreviates Euler-Mascheroni.)
blocks.origin: const class cem { γ }

blocks.name: diff.cem.s
diff.cem.c
diff.cem.w
df-em
blocks.content: Define the Euler-Mascheroni constant, ` gamma ` = 0.577.... This is the limit of the series ` sum_ k e. ( 1 ... m ) ( 1 / k ) - ( log `` m ) ` , with a proof that the limit exists in ~ emcl . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: logdifbnd
blocks.content: Bound on the difference of logs. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-May-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm logdifbnd(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(clog, c0)), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))

  mpbird(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(cfv(ce, cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))), cle, cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))))
  eqbrtrd(cfv(ce, cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))), cle, cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))

  sylancr(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), crp), wcel(nat1, crp), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), crp))
  rpaddcl(nat1, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))
  reefcld(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), wcel(c0, crp))
  syl(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), clt, cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), crp))
  efgt1p(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crp), wb(wbr(cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cle, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wbr(cfv(ce, cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))), cle, cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)))), wcel(cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cr), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cr))
  eqeltrd(cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cr, co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(clog, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  eqtrd(cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(clog, c0)), cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  fveq2d(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0), wcel(c0, crp))
  eqtr2d(co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0), co(co(c0, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  divdird(c0, nat1, c0, wcel(c0, crp))

  oveq1d(co(c0, cdiv, c0), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0), nat1, wcel(c0, crp))
  dividd(c0, wcel(c0, crp))
  rpcn(c0)
  rpne0(c0)
  mpancom(wcel(c0, crp), wceq(cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0)), co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(clog, c0))), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), crp))
  relogdiv(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c0)
  resubcld(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cfv(clog, c0), wcel(c0, crp))
  syl(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cr), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), crp))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, crp), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), crp), wcel(nat1, crp))

  rpreccl(c0)
  efle(cfv(clog, co(nat1, caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), co(nat1, cdiv, c0))

  3brtr3d(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(clog, c0)), cfv(clog, cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0)), wcel(c0, crp))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(cfv(clog, cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), cle, cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0))), wbr(cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cle, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0)))

  0le1()
  mpbird(wcel(c0, crp), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), clt, nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, nat1)))
  breqtrrd(nat1, clt, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmul, nat1), co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, crp))
  ltaddrp2d(nat1, c0, wcel(c0, crp))
  mulid1d(co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, crp))
  ltdivmuld(nat1, co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat1, wcel(c0, crp))
  eqtrd(co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, crp))
  oveq2d(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(c0, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, crp))
  3eqtr3rd(co(nat1, cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(c0, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(c0, crp))
  divsubdird(co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat1, co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, crp))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cmin, nat1), cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1), c0, wcel(c0, crp))
  pncand(c0, nat1, wcel(c0, crp))
  recnd(nat1, wcel(c0, crp))
  oveq1d(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), nat1, wcel(c0, crp))

blocks.name: emcllem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ emcl . The series ` F ` and ` G ` are sequences of real numbers that approach ` gamma ` from above and below, respectively. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm emcllem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wa(wf(c0, cn, cr), wf(c1, cn, cr))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cn, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  pm3.2i(wf(c0, cn, cr), wf(c1, cn, cr))
  fmpti(s0, c0, cn, cr, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, cv(s0))))
  resubcld(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cfv(clog, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  relogcld(cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnrp(cv(s0))
  fmpti(s0, c1, cn, cr, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  resubcld(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  fsumrecl(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  fzfid(nat1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnrecred(cv(s1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)))))
  adantl(wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cv(s1), co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s1), cn))
  elfznn(cv(s1), cv(s0))
  relogcld(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  nnrpd(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  peano2nn(cv(s0))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, cv(s0))
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), cn)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm emcllem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 : ℕ → ℝ)∧(c1 : ℕ → ℝ))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(sum(s1 ∈(1[...]s0),(1[÷]s1))[-](log ` s0)))
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦(sum(s1 ∈(1[...]s0),(1[÷]s1))[-](log `(s0[+]1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  pm3.2i((c0 : ℕ → ℝ), (c1 : ℕ → ℝ))
  fmpti(s0, c0, cn, cr, (sum(s1 ∈(1[...]s0),(1[÷]s1))[-](log ` s0)))
  resubcld(sum(s1 ∈(1[...]s0),(1[÷]s1)), (log ` s0), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  relogcld(s0, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  nnrp(s0)
  fmpti(s0, c1, cn, cr, (sum(s1 ∈(1[...]s0),(1[÷]s1))[-](log `(s0[+]1))))
  resubcld(sum(s1 ∈(1[...]s0),(1[÷]s1)), (log `(s0[+]1)), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  fsumrecl(s1, (1[...]s0), (1[÷]s1), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  fzfid(nat1, s0, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  nnrecred(s1, (s0 ∈ ℕ ∧ s1 ∈(1[...]s0)))
  adantl(s0 ∈ ℕ, s1 ∈(1[...]s0), s1 ∈ ℕ)
  elfznn(s1, s0)
  relogcld((s0[+]1), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  nnrpd((s0[+]1), s0 ∈ ℕ)
  peano2nn(s0)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, nat1, cfz, s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cfz.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, cn)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cn.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: emcllem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ emcl . ` F ` is increasing, and ` G ` is decreasing. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm emcllem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wa(wbr(cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c1, c0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cn, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, cv(s0)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  jca(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c1, c0)), wbr(cfv(c2, c0), cle, cfv(c2, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  3brtr4d(cfv(c1, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(c1, c0), co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, c0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cle, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, c0))), wbr(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), caddc, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, c0)))))
  3brtr4d(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), caddc, co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), cmin, cfv(clog, c0))), co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), caddc, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), caddc, co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(clog, c0))), wcel(c0, cn))
  leadd2dd(csu(s1, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(clog, c0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  breqtrd(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, co(cfv(clog, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cmin, cfv(clog, c0)), cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0)), wcel(c0, cn))
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), cle, cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0))), wbr(cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cle, cfv(ce, cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0)))))
  breqtrd(cfv(ce, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), cle, cfv(ce, cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0))), co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c0, cn))
  eflegeo(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  rpge0d(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cn))
  rpreccld(co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))
  mpbid(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), clt, nat1), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat1), clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  syl5eqbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat1), clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1), nat1, wcel(c0, cn))
  1div1e1()
  breqtrd(nat1, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1), co(nat1, caddc, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn), wbr(nat1, clt, co(nat1, caddc, c0)), wcel(nat1, cr), wcel(c0, crp))
  ltaddrp(nat1, c0)
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(nat1, caddc, c0), co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cc), wcel(c0, cc))
  addcom(nat1, c0)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cn), wb(wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat1), clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), clt, nat1)), wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))

  mpanl12(wa(wcel(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cr), wbr(nat0, clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wb(wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, nat1), clt, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), wbr(co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)), clt, nat1)), wcel(nat1, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  1re()
  0lt1()
  ltrec1(nat1, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  3eqtr4d(co(nat1, cdiv, co(nat1, cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), cfv(ce, cfv(clog, co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0))), co(nat1, cdiv, co(c0, cdiv, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cdiv, c0), wcel(c0, cn))
  recdivd(c0, co(c0, caddc, nat1), wcel(c0, cn))

blocks.name: emcllem6
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ emcl . By the previous lemmas, ` F ` and ` G ` must approach a common limit, which is ` gamma ` by definition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: fsumharmonic
blocks.content: Bound a finite sum based on the harmonic series, where the "strong" bound ` C ` only applies asymptotically, and there is a "weak" bound ` R ` for the remaining values. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-May-2016.)
